This +2 striking longbow is carefully handcrafted from a length of flexible green-tinted wood, etched in a variety of runic symbols, and strung with a dawnsilver bowstring. When you shoot the bow in rapid succession, the echoing chords generated by the bowstring form a haunting dirge that evokes the inevitable end of all things. If you have the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.Item.Hunt Prey] class feature, the weapon gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Thundering] rune on Strikes against your prey.

Activateâ€”Song of the Bow 2 (concentration)

Frequency once per day

Effect You shoot an arrow thrumming with the song of the bow. Make a Strike with the bow that deals damage as normal. As long as the Strike isn't a critical failure, the arrow explodes in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] around your target, dealing @Damage[5d10[sonic]] damage to creatures in the area, including the target, with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|basic:true]. Any creature that critically fails is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Deafened] for 1 minute. If any creature in the area is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unnoticed] by you, you learn its location, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] to you instead.
